Variable Documentation

global $pomPREFIX

In order to use the POM functions, the following line must be added to the LocalSettings.php file of the wiki system:
include_once ('extensions/PageObjectModel/POM.php');
This is the path to the starting file of the package. Make sure the package exists under the path given.
In the directory <POM_HOME>/POM/Examples you can find examples how to use the package or you can check the description of each class.
